title: tuNai tandu endanai aNaindiDum
sahitya:
tuNai tandu endanai aNaindiDum ayyanE taNikaittalam mEvum deiva shikhAmaNiyE


anupallavi

  iNai undanukkEdu IrEzhulagam mIdum enra pugazh Onga ninru tigazhvOnE


caraNam    nambi vandadun padam kumbiDum anbar tammanak-kurai tIra dayai kUrum ayyanE
vimmi ennuLLam vIngiyE EngAmal nimmadi perum oru nilai pera udaviDum
